attributes.action: Parliamentary MPs to vote on whether to actually leave the European Union
attributes.additional_details: A large number of leave leaders are reneging on the promises made during the campaign. The result of the referendum should therefore be used in it's advisory role.
attributes.background: The EU referendum result was very close and the effect of leaving the EU unknown. Some people may have voted leave based on unsound information. Now that a lot of forecasts have been shown to be correct, it would be very unwise to actually leave the EU.
